actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to establish a new prospective payment system for Federally-qualified health centers and rural health clinics.

summary.text: Safety Net Preservation Act of 1999 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to establish a new prospective payment system for federally-qualified health centers and rural health clinics.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to establish a new prospective payment system for Federally-qualified health centers and rural health clinics.
